Package ohos.aafwk.ability

Class Ability.WindowAttributeHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.aafwk.ability.Ability.WindowAttributeHelper
  • Enclosing class:
    Ability

    public static class Ability.WindowAttributeHelper
extends Object
    Helps you use an Intent to set window attributes for the current application.

    This class encapsulates padding settings of a window in an Intent, and you do not need to care about how the data is stored.

    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Aafwk#ABILITY

    • Constructor Detail

      • WindowAttributeHelper

        public WindowAttributeHelper​(Intent intentAttribute)
        A parameterized constructor used to create a WindowAttributeHelper instance.

        The Intent carried in the instance automatically stores the attribute settings after a setting method provided by WindowAttributeHelper is called.

        Parameters:
        intentAttribute - Indicates the Intent used for storing window attributes.

    • Method Detail

      • setLeftPadding

        public Ability.WindowAttributeHelper setLeftPadding​(int left)
        Sets the left padding of a window.
        Parameters:
        left - Indicates the left padding of a window to set, in pixels
        Returns:
        Returns the WindowAttributeHelper object with the specified left padding.
